metadata.topic: There are no good reasons to not wear a helmet while riding a bicycle

moderator_initial_opinion:
I am generally in favor of the statement: "There are no good reasons to not wear a helmet while riding a bicycle".

This is because helmets are highly effective in preventing head injuries and fatalities in bicycle accidents, and the benefits of wearing a helmet far outweigh any perceived inconvenience or discomfort.
